New Records: Bobby Witt Jr. drove in his 100th run of the season with a solo homer in the first inning
Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. hit a solo home run in the first inning
The Royals scored twice in the fifth
Witt hit a sacrifice fly in the fifth and a run-scoring double in the sixth
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Matt Quatraro said of having a winning record after going 56-106 last season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals won for the seventh time in nine games since a seven-game losing streak
The Royals assured themselves of their first winning season since 2015
The Royals had five stolen bases, three by Maikol Garcia and two by Kyle Isbel
Others: The series concludes Sunday with Royals RHP Brady Singer facing rookie RHP Jared Jones
